content.raw: I don't really understand the original description but I agree that a tape measure in Gazebo would be handy (I'm talking about the actual gazebo window, i.e. measure distances between objects for example). Maybe similar to what SketchUp has? I don't like the measurement tool that Meshlab has because you can't rotate while measuring which makes it impossible to make correct measurements (or maybe I just don't know how to use it correctly).
